8 class Talker:

10  def __init__(self, yandex_voice_key: str):
11  self.yandex_voice_key = yandex_voice_key

13  def _play_wav(self, wav_src: http.client.HTTPResponse) -> None:
14 
15  #define stream chunk
16  chunk = 1024
17 
18  #open a wav format music
19  f = wave.Wave_read(wav_src)
20  #instantiate PyAudio
21  p = pyaudio.PyAudio()
22  #open stream
23  stream = p.open(format = p.get_format_from_width(f.getsampwidth()),
24  channels = f.getnchannels(),
25  rate = f.getframerate(),
26  output = True)
27  #read data
28  data = f.readframes(chunk)
29 
30  #play stream
31  while data:
32  stream.write(data)
33  data = f.readframes(chunk)
34 
35  #stop stream
36  stream.stop_stream()
37  stream.close()
38 
39  #close PyAudio
40  p.terminate()
41 
42  def sayyandex(self, text: str) -> None:
43  try:
44  url = 'https://tts.voicetech.yandex.net/generate?text='
45  url += parse.quote(text)
46  url += '&format=wav&lang=ru&speaker=ermil&key=' + self.yandex_voice_key
47  req = request.urlopen(url)
48 
49  self._play_wav(req)
50  print('yandex!')
51  except Exception as e:
52  logging.error(str(e))
53  print(str(e))
